data.title: Author Names (Abbreviated)
data.text:
G.W. Prescott -- Iowa Algae

RETURN TO TITLE PAGE ---- RETURN TO INDEX

Abbreviated names of taxonomic authors

Source of information: Brummitt, R.K. and C.E. Powell (eds.). 1992. Authors of Plant Names.

Abbreviations alphebetized letter by letter, with full name following
